text: Istres is a commune in the Bouches-du-Rhône department in the Provence-Alpes- Côte d'Azur region in the south of France. About 45,000 people live there. La fête des bergers (The shepherds' festival) is held at the end of November and beginning of December. Category:Communes in Bouches-du-Rhône Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Istres
